name: Naya Capital Management UK Limited
legal: Limited Liability Company under UK law
membership: Naya Capital Management UK Limited is authorised and regulated by the UK Financial Conduct Authority with registered number 712130.
goal:
Naya Capital Management UK Limited is a London based, global investment management firm. The firm was originally founded as Naya Management LLP in 2012.

Naya has a value-oriented investment strategy, using a bottom-up fundamental approach with the aim of achieving alpha based absolute returns. Naya operates within a global universe, but has a concentration in areas of expertise such as TMT, Energy, Industrials and Consumer. The Firm has a global market focus though we concentrate our portfolio primarily in the US, Europe and Emerging Markets.

Research primarily consists of exhaustive fundamental research to understand industry dynamics and company specific operational levers including local legislation or proposed legislative changes.
interests: Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Internal Market, Taxation
euInitiatives: Naya follows a broad range initiatives and policies of relevance to the financial services industry and to our particular investment sectors.
